roleset.name: to rent property one holds by lease to another

example.name: all arguments
example.text: WPP , which assumes financial control of its businesses in a hands - on way , instituted a new financial system and plans to sublet some floors in Ogilvy 's new headquarters building to outsiders .

propbank.arg: WPP , which assumes financial control of its businesses in a hands - on way
some floors in Ogilvy 's new headquarters building

roleset.note: SUBLET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'sublet' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from sublet.01-v predicate notes)
